data.title: List of channels available on Vision TV and Vision Direct
data.meta_description: NOTE: This page is under reorganization.This is a list of channels that are available on Vision TV and Vision Direct.
data.text:
NOTE: This page is under reorganization.

This is a list of channels that are available on Vision TV and Vision Direct.

Channel formats, packs and services[]

Packages[]

Package Free-to-air Channels that are receivable without the need of a subscription Free-to-view Channels that are receivable, but requires a smartcard Vision TV Vision Communications's basic pack to which other packs or subscription channels can be added Vision TV Premium Vision Communications's premium package that allows access to almost all channels Vision Cinema Pack Additional pack for Cinevision channels Vision Sports Pack Additional pack for Vision Sports channels Kids Pack Additional pack for kids channels
